article.Heading: GST Ground Report: Here's how retail market is coping with GST
article.Summary: Goods and services tax (GST) is here and CNBC-TV18's Priya Sheth has been on the ground to find out how the economy is coping with this seminal change. She visited the electronics retail chain store, Vijay Sales for a ground check.
article.Body:
Goods and Services Tax (GST) is here and CNBC-TV18's reporters have been on the ground to find out how the retail market is coping with this seminal change.

Watch videos for more...
